title: Customize sender email address and sender name for notification emails
content:
By default, Service Management displays sm_noreply@opentext.com as the sender email address and Service Management  as the sender name in notification emails. This page describes how to customize these values.

Configure email sender name

To display a custom sender name in notification emails, perform the following steps as a tenant admin:

  1. Log in to the Agent Portal.
  2. From the main menu, navigate to Administration > Configuration > Application Settings.
  3. Enter the custom sender name in the Mail sender name field.
